title: A Matter of Scale (with Megan Rapinoe)
description:
DeRay, Kaya, De'Ara, and Sam dive into the underreported news of the week, including hospital coronavirus infections, virtual learning, sports arena voting, and COVID-19's rural devastation. Then, DeRay sits down with soccer star Megan Rapinoe to talk about her new book "One Life."


Links:

DeRay: https://www.themarshallproject.org/2020/11/08/when-going-to-the-hospital-is-just-as-bad-as-jail

Kaya: https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/28/opinion/virtual-school-racism.html

De'Ara: https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/14/opinion/coronavirus-poverty-us.html

Sam: https://www.usatoday.com/story/sports/2020/11/13/how-sports-arenas-ran-up-score-election-thousands-voters/6175568002/
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
